name: The beauties&zombies of beach for VR
storyline: You would dancing and swinging with beauties together, also could climbing、shooting arrows and Maze adventure in daytime. It's that all? No, "The time backflow machine" would summon you to the old beach, everything will be change. Dark clouds in the sky, romantic passionate beach change into horrible irritative night, the beauty zombies would run to you when you still don't know what happen here. Hurry up! Pick the weapons to kill them!
summary: This is an intense zombie game for VR.
